name: Be Kind
description:
You work in a VHS rental store. Customers will sometimes return tapes without being properly rewind. You can charge more for longer movies. Charge too much and a customer might be angry.

Remember to maintain the rewinding machine to prevent it from overloading.

Tip: Fixing a broken machine costs more than regular maintenance.

This game was made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam, with the Rewind theme.
